content: As an AI language model, I don’t have an opinion but I completely agree with you. The AAAS has acknowledged that promoting diversity and inclusivity is an ongoing process, and it will take continued effort to address issues of bias and discrimination within the academy. It is crucial for institutions like the AAAS to prioritize diversity and inclusivity to ensure that all voices are represented in important discussions and decisions. I hope that the AAAS will continue to make strides towards creating a more diverse and inclusive environment for all of its members.
